ArbitrationCompleted(bytes32).details: To be emitted when reporting the arbitrator answer to Realitio.

ArbitrationFailed(bytes32).details: To be emitted when the dispute could not be created on the Foreign Chain.

ArbitratorAnswered(bytes32,bytes32).details: To be emitted when receiving the answer from the arbitrator.

RequestAcknowledged(bytes32).details: To be emitted when there arbitration request acknowledgement is sent to the Foreign Chain.

RequestCanceled(bytes32).details: To be emitted when there arbitration request is canceled.

RequestNotified(bytes32,bytes32,address).details: To be emitted when the Realitio contract has been notified of an arbitration request.

params._contestedAnswer: The answer the requester deem to be correct.
params._requester: The address of the user that requested arbitration.

RequestRejected(bytes32,bytes32,address).details: To be emitted when arbitration request is received but remained pending.

params._contestedAnswer: The answer the requester deem to be correct.
params._requester: The address of the user that requested arbitration.

handleNotifiedRequest(bytes32).details: Handles arbitration request after it has been notified to Realitio for a given question.

handleRejectedRequest(bytes32).details: Handles arbitration request after it has been rejected due to the quesiton being finalized or the contested answer being different from the current one.

receiveArbitrationAnswer(bytes32,bytes32.details: Recieves the answer to a specified question.

receiveArbitrationFailure(bytes32).details: Recieves a failed attempt to request arbitration.

params._contestedAnswer: The answer the requester deem to be correct.
params._requester: The address of the user that requested arbitration.

reportArbitrationAnswer(bytes32,bytes32,.details: Report the answer provided by the arbitrator to a specified question.

params._lastAnswerOrCommitmentID: The last answer given, or its commitment ID if it was a commitment, to the question in the Realitio contract.
params._lastAnswerer: The last answerer to the question in the Realitio contract.
params._lastHistoryHash: The history hash given with the last answer to the question in the Realitio contract.

params._foreignChainId: The ID of the chain where the foreign proxy is deployed.

params._governor: The address of the new governor.

foreignChainId.details: The chain ID where the foreign proxy is deployed.

foreignProxy.details: Address of the counter-party proxy on the Foreign Chain. TRUSTED.

questionIDToRequest.details: Associates an arbitration request with a question ID.

realitio.details: The address of the Realitio contract. TRUSTED.

ArbitrationFailed(bytes32).notice: This will happen if there is a remaining arbitration fee users fail to pay.

RequestNotified(bytes32,bytes32,address).notice: This will happen if the best answer for a given question changes between the arbitration is requested on the Foreign Chain and the cross-chain message reaches the home chain and becomes the same answer as the one from requester.

RequestRejected(bytes32,bytes32,address).notice: This will happen if the best answer for a given question changes between the arbitration is requested on the Foreign Chain and the cross-chain message reaches the home chain and becomes the same answer as the one from requester.

constructor.notice: Creates an arbitration proxy on the home chain.

handleNotifiedRequest(bytes32).notice: Sends the arbitration acknowledgement to the Foreign Chain.

handleRejectedRequest(bytes32).notice: Sends the arbitration rejection to the Foreign Chain.

receiveArbitrationRequest(bytes32,bytes3.notice: Recieves the requested arbitration for a question.

setForeignProxy(address,uint256).notice: Sets the address of the arbitration proxy on the Foreign Chain.

setGovernor(address).notice: Sets the address of a new governor.
